Html:
Hey Everyone!

WPP told me that the connection for Adobe Flash was failed.
So I started to search in the board here: no result.
Then google: no result.
Hey come on, google without a result? Are you kidding?

I've found this:
http://www.adobe.com/licensing/distribution/strategies/sms.html

And the URL: https://fpdownload.adobe.com/get/flashplayer/distribution/win/AdobeFlashPlayerCatalog_SCUP.cab

So it was changed from:
http://fpdownload.adobe.com/get/flashplayer/current/licensing/win
to:
https://fpdownload.adobe.com/get/flashplayer/distribution/win/

So you only have to change the URL within the catalog feed and you are done!

Now I can download Flash Player Version 24 and deploy it with the WPP.
I hope, if someones trying to find the new URL he will find this post.

Cheers,
m3D
Yeah! Thank you! Run in the same problem today...
